text: I'd like to suggest some updates to the nice folks at Unitful.jl <https://github.com/PainterQubits/Unitful.jl> but I haven't found any contact information for the project. What's the proper netiquette to make the suggestions? Should I just fork and pull request the features I want, or is there some better way to request feedback from their team?

elements.text: I'd like to suggest some updates to the nice folks at Unitful.jl

but I haven't found any contact information for the project. What's the proper netiquette to make the suggestions? Should I just fork and pull request the features I want, or is there some better way to request feedback from their team?

text: hi, welcome!  yes, you can either open an issue in the repo to suggest improvements, or (better :wink:) implement them yourself and submit pull requests

elements.text: hi, welcome!  yes, you can either open an issue in the repo to suggest improvements, or (better
) implement them yourself and submit pull requests
